text: Russell Joseph Howard (born 23 March 1980) is a British stand-up comedian. He has a show on BBC3 called Russell Howard's Good News. He was born on 23 March 1980. He is 1.77 metres tall. He used to be on the TV panel show Mock the Week hosted by Dara Ã“ Briain. ==References== Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:British stand-up comedians Category:Comedians from Bristol Category:English television personalities
title: Russell Howard
